name: SonicBuds Pro 2
description: Crystal clear sound with deep bass & noise cancellation, sweat proof earbuds for active lifestyles with 24 hrs battery life.

name: Chronofit Neo Smartwatch
description: Sleek fitness tracker with heart rate monitor, waterproof design with call and text notifications with 30 hrs of battery.

name: Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra 5G (12GB RAM, 256GB Storage)
description: A powerhouse flagship with a built-in S Pen, 108MP quad camera, and a stunning 6.8 Dynamic AMOLED 2X display. Powered by Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 and a 5000mAh battery for all-day performance and creativity.

name: Apple iPad 11″ (2025, A16 Chip, 256GB, Wi-Fi + 5G)
description: Powered by the blazing-fast A16 chip, this iPad features a stunning 11″ Liquid Retina display and all-day battery life. Ideal for work, creativity, and entertainment with 5G connectivity and Apple Pencil support.

name: Claura Women’s Fit & Flare Maxi Dress
description: A breezy and elegant floral midi dress with a flattering fit-and-flare silhouette. Crafted in soft rayon with puff sleeves and a cinched waist—perfect for brunches, dates, or festive gatherings.

name: Lasso® Stylish Women’s Sling Bag with Adjustable Strap
description: A sleek and spacious crossbody sling bag made from premium water-resistant polyester. Features 5 compartments and a 5L capacity—perfect for office, travel, or casual outings.

name: Noise ColorFit Ultra 3 Smartwatch (1.96″ AMOLED, BT Calling)
description: A premium smartwatch with a vibrant 1.96″ AMOLED display, Bluetooth calling, and 100+ sports modes. Features SpO2, heart rate, and sleep tracking with up to 7-day battery life.

name: Apple iPhone 13 PRO (128GB, A18 Chip, 5G)
description: Experience Apple Intelligence with the iPhone 16’s A18 chip, 48MP dual camera, and 6.1″ Super Retina XDR display. Designed for speed, creativity, and privacy with all-day battery life and MagSafe support.

name: Titan Neo Analog Black Dial Men’s Watch
description: A timeless analog watch with a bold black dial, stainless steel case, and genuine leather strap. Water-resistant and ideal for both office wear and casual outings.

name: Apple MacBook Air (13-inch, M4 Chip, 16GB RAM, 256GB SSD)
description: Supercharged by the Apple M4 chip, this ultra-thin MacBook Air delivers blazing-fast performance, a stunning Liquid Retina display, and all-day battery life. Perfect for students, creators, and professionals on the go.

name: Highlander Men Slim Fit Mid-Rise Stretchable Jeans
description: A modern slim-fit denim crafted from stretchable cotton blend fabric for all-day comfort. Features a clean look with a mid-rise waist and classic 5-pocket styling—perfect for casual and semi-formal wear.

name: Apple Watch SE (2nd Gen, 2023) [GPS 40mm]
description: Stay connected and active with the Apple Watch SE featuring fitness & sleep tracking, crash detection, heart rate monitoring, and a vibrant Retina display. Lightweight, swimproof, and seamlessly compatible with your Apple ecosystem.

name: Milton Aura 1000 Thermosteel Water Bottle
description: Keep your drinks hot or cold for up to 24 hours with this ISI-certified, leak-proof stainless steel bottle. Ideal for office, gym, or travel—durable, rust-proof, and easy to carry.

name: Treo by Milton Clarion-S Borosilicate Glass Bottle with Silicone Sleeve
description: A sleek, BPA-free borosilicate glass bottle with a protective silicone sleeve and leak-proof lid. Ideal for storing water, juices, or detox drinks—durable, stylish, and fridge-friendly.

name: Puma X-Ray 2 Square Superior Comfort Sneakers
description: A bold, retro-inspired sneaker with breathable mesh, synthetic overlays, and SoftFoam+ cushioning for all-day comfort. Ideal for casual wear, gym sessions, or street-style looks.

name: Nike Revolution 7 Men’s Running Shoes
description: Lightweight and responsive, these running shoes feature a breathable mesh upper, soft foam midsole, and durable rubber outsole. Designed for everyday runs and all-day comfort with a sleek, sporty look
